function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Integration of data from large-scale cohort data sets across Europe","Impact":"Increased risk of data contamination and propagation of incorrect information","Mitigation":"Implement robust data cleaning and validation processes, and ensure strict data governance and security measures","Technologies":"Data validation algorithms, secure data storage and transfer protocols","People":"Data scientists, cohort data managers, researchers","Owner":"Data governance and security teams"},{"Description":"Enrollment of over 1,300,000 individuals in the ORCHESTRA cohort","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of contagious diseases within the cohort due to close contact and interaction","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, regular testing, and isolation measures for infected individuals","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, advanced testing technologies, digital health monitoring systems","People":"Enrolled individuals, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Healthcare authorities and research institutions"}]}
